```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
```

## Simulate baseline with no seasonality and two weekly patterns


```{r}
## sim 1
baseline_1  <- simulate_baseline_data(
                                    start_date = as.Date("2012-01-01"),
                                    end_date = as.Date("2019-12-31"),
                                    seasonal_pattern_n = 1,
                                    weekly_pattern_n = 2,
                                    param_list = list(alpha = 6, beta = 0, gamma1 = 0.2, gamma2 = 0.2, gamma3 = 0.5, gamma4 = 0.4, phi = 2, shift = 29 )

)

baseline_1[,s:=1]

baseline <- rbind(baseline_1,baseline_2,baseline_3,baseline_4,baseline_5,baseline_6,baseline_7,baseline_8,baseline_9,baseline_10,baseline_11,baseline_12,baseline_13,baseline_14,baseline_15,baseline_16)

q <- ggplot(baseline, aes(x = date, y = cases_n))
q <- q + geom_line(lwd = 1)
q <- q + facet_wrap(~s, scales = "free")
q <- q + splstyle::scale_fill_fhi(palette = "contrast")
q <- q + splstyle::theme_fhi_lines_horizontal(legend_position = "bottom")
q


q <- ggplot(baseline, aes(wday, cases_n, group=wday))
q <- q + facet_wrap(~s, scales = "free")
q <- q + geom_boxplot()
q

q <- ggplot(baseline, aes(wday, cases_n, group=calmonth))
q <- q + facet_wrap(~s, scales = "free")
q <- q + geom_boxplot()
q

```


## Add seasonal outbreak 

```{r}


baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15 <- simulate_seasonal_outbreak_data (baseline_15,
                                             week_season_start = 40,
                                             week_season_peak = 4,
                                             week_season_end = 20,
                                             num_season_outbreak=1,
                                             baseline_param_list = list(alpha = 3, beta = 0, gamma1 = 0.8, gamma2 = 0.6, gamma3 = 0.8, gamma4 = 0.4, phi = 4, shift = 29),
                                             outbreak_param_list = list(m = 2))

baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15[, cases_tot:= seasonal_outbreak_case_rw + cases_n]                      



q <- ggplot(baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15, aes(x = date, y = cases_tot))
q <- q + geom_line(colour = "red")
q <- q + geom_line(data=baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15, aes(x = date, y = cases_n))
q <- q + scale_y_continuous(breaks = unique(baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15$calyear))
q <- q + splstyle::scale_fill_fhi(palette = "contrast")
q <- q + splstyle::theme_fhi_lines_horizontal(legend_position = "bottom")
q



```


## Add spikeoutbreak 

```{r}
baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15  <- simulate_spike_outbreak_data(baseline_with_seasonal_outbreak_15,
                                                      num_outbreak=1,
                                                      baseline_param_list = list(alpha = 3, beta = 0, gamma1 = 0.8, gamma2 = 0.6, gamma3 = 0.8, gamma4 = 0.4, phi = 4, shift = 29),
                                                      outbreak_param_list = list(m = 2)
                                                      )

baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15[, cases_tot:= seasonal_outbreak_case_rw + cases_n + sp_outbreak_case_rw]                      


q <- ggplot(baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15, aes(x = date, y = cases_n))
q <- q + geom_line(colour = "red")
q <- q + geom_line(baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15, aes(x = date, y = sp_outbreak_case_rw+cases_n))
q <- q + geom_line(baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15, aes(x = date, y = sp_outbreak_case_rw),colour = "green")

q <- q + scale_y_continuous(breaks = unique(baseline_with_seasonal_spike_outbreak15$calyear))
q <- q + splstyle::scale_fill_fhi(palette = "contrast")
q <- q + splstyle::theme_fhi_lines_horizontal(legend_position = "bottom")
q


```
